name: crisislink
description: Real-Time Disaster Rescue Platform for South Africa

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run db:setup && npm run start:production
scripts.test: concurrently "cd frontend && npm test" "cd backend && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "cd backend && npm run lint"

author: lintshiwe (https://github.com/Lintshiwe)
